name: UserInfo

methods.name: getDefaultCurrency
methods.description: Returns the context user's default currency code for multiple currency organizations or the organization's currency code for single currency organizations.

methods.name: getFirstName
methods.description: Returns the context user's first name

methods.name: getLanguage
methods.description: Returns the context user's language

methods.name: getLastName
methods.description: Returns the context user's last name

methods.name: getLocale
methods.description: Returns the context user's locale.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the context user's full name. The format of the name depends on the language preferences specified for the organization.

methods.name: getOrganizationId
methods.description: Returns the context organization's ID.

methods.name: getOrganizationName
methods.description: Returns the context organization's company name.

methods.name: getProfileId
methods.description: Returns the context user's profile ID.

methods.name: getSessionId
methods.description: Returns the session ID for the current session.

methods.name: getTimeZone
methods.description: Returns the current user’s local time zone.

methods.name: getUiTheme
methods.description: Returns the preferred theme for the current user. Use getUiThemeDisplayed to determine the theme actually displayed to the current user.

methods.name: getUiThemeDisplayed
methods.description: Returns the theme being displayed for the current user.

methods.name: getUserEmail
methods.description: Returns the current user’s email address.

methods.name: getUserId
methods.description: Returns the context user's ID

methods.name: getUserName
methods.description: Returns the context user's login name.

methods.name: getUserRoleId
methods.description: Returns the context user's role ID.

methods.name: getUserType
methods.description: Returns the context user's type.

methods.name: isCurrentUserLicensed
methods.description: Returns true if the context user has a license to any managed package denoted by the namespace. Otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isCurrentUserLicensedForPackage
methods.description: Returns true if the context user has a license to the managed package denoted by the package ID. Otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: isMultiCurrencyOrganization
methods.description: Specifies whether the organization uses multiple currencies.

description: Contains methods for obtaining information about the context
